alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:24PM EDT until September 07 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jefferson County in Big Bend Florida... East central Leon County in Big Bend Florida... Southwestern Madison County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 524 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Monticello, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello, Lamont, Capps, Lois, Eridu, Nash, Thomas City, Drifton, Casa Blanco, Waukeenah, Montivilla, Wacissa, Lloyd, Wacissa Springs, and Lake Miccosukee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
